subject: Unconditional Love
text:
Unconditional Live is Light.  
Unconditional Love is Hope.  
Unconditional Live is nonjudgmental and forgiving.  
Unconditional Love is to the Spirit.  
Unconditional Love makes no demands.  
Unconditional Love does not possess.  
Unconditional Love is apart from time.  
Unconditional Love bypasses the physical.  
Unconditional Love is God.
